revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U4G8F2DTR-BC; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = Serial(SPI) |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = PcT Limited;PCT25VF080B; |flash2size = 1 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41J256M8HX-15E:D; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F4:CE:46

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2011 |estprice = 200 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA4MRJP57919 |asin = B005E81W6O |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B005E81W6O |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "PCB PN:316D64200009_R02", "HF-PCB;SBU,EMAG,MICRO CLIENT2,PV2", :",RC2_SI4,130*107mm", "T=1.6MM IMMERSION SILVER,6 LAYER", "©2011 HPC", :"HP Engineering" are silkscreened on board bottom.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88AP510 @1.0GHz ARM v7 (PJ4 core) *GPU: ''Vivante GC600'' (OpenGL 3.0, OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG) *Storage: 512MB NAND Flash, 1MB SPI Serial Flash *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V/3A via barrel
==See also== :;[[HP]] • [[HP Wireless Adapters]] *[[HP t410 Smart Zero Client]] *[[HP t530]] • B07KYHD9XQ *[[HP t5325]] • B0030CFC3K *[[HP t5335z]] • Zero Client *[[HP t5540]] • B00IA4KILO *[[HP t5740]] • B004LNDLMQ
